mapper.insert: insert into approval (apr_id, af_id, emp_id, apr_receivedate, apr_title, apr_content, apr_status,apr_comment, apr_signdate) values(approval_seq.nextval,#{af_id},#{emp_id},sysdate ,#{apr_title},#{apr_content},'0','z',sysdate)
mapper.update: update approval set apr_status = #{apr_status}, apr_comment = #{apr_comment}, apr_signdate = sysdate where apr_id = #{apr_id}
